cobblemon.species.goomba.name: Goomba
cobblemon.species.partnergoomba.name: Partner Goomba
cobblemon.species.partnergoomba.desc1: Some Goombas choose to be more friendly and accompany others on adventures, gaining additional strength from their friendship
cobblemon.species.paragoomba.name: Paragoomba
cobblemon.species.paragoomba.desc1: A minor minion, but one who has obtained wings.
cobblemon.species.spikedgoomba.name: Spiked Goomba
cobblemon.species.spikedgoomba.desc1: A minor minion, but armored with a dangerous hat.
cobblemon.species.hypergoomba.name: Hyper Goomba
cobblemon.species.hypergoomba.desc1: A green Goomba that can charge itself up for powerful attacks.
cobblemon.species.hyperparagoomba.name: Hyper Paragoomba
cobblemon.species.hyperparagoomba.desc1: A winged green Goomba that can charge itself up for powerful attacks.
cobblemon.species.hyperspikedgoomba.name: Hyper Spiked Goomba
cobblemon.species.hyperspikedgoomba.desc: A spiked green Goomba that can charge itself up for powerful attacks.
cobblemon.species.gloomba.name: Gloomba
cobblemon.species.gloomba.desc1: A shadowy Goomba which is only found in dark underground areas.
cobblemon.species.paragloomba.name: Paragloomba
cobblemon.species.paragloomba.desc1: A shadowy winged Goomba which is only found in dark underground areas.
cobblemon.species.spikedgloomba.name: Spiked Gloomba
cobblemon.species.spikedgloomba.desc1: A shadowy spiked Goomba which is only found in dark underground areas.
cobblemon.species.bluegoomba.name: Blue Goomba
cobblemon.species.bluegoomba.desc1: A slightly stronger goomba species with a blue tint
cobblemon.species.redgoomba.name: Red Goomba
cobblemon.species.redgoomba.desc1: A slightly stronger goomba species with a red tint
cobblemon.species.royalgoomba.name: Royal Goomba
cobblemon.species.royalgoomba.desc1: A large goomba, who rules over other goombas
cobblemon.species.supergoomba.name: Super Goomba
cobblemon.species.supergoomba.desc1: A lucky Goomba who has gotten their non-existent hands on some fancy magical boots and headwear to match
cobblemon.species.ultragoomba.name: Ultra Goomba
cobblemon.species.ultragoomba.desc1: An extremely lucky Goomba who has managed to be empowered by some mighty magical boots, helmet, and even some wings too
cobblemon.species.koopa.name: Koopa
cobblemon.species.koopa.desc1: A turtle like creature, Koopas can be found all over,
cobblemon.species.partnerkoopa.name: Partner Koopa
cobblemon.species.partnerkoopa.desc1: Some Koopas choose to be more friendly and accompany others on adventures, gaining additional strength from their friendship
cobblemon.species.parakoopa.name: Parakoopa
cobblemon.species.parakoopa.desc1: A turtle like creature, Koopas can be found all over,
cobblemon.species.kpkoopa.name: KP Koopa
cobblemon.species.kpkoopa.desc1: A Koopa who has trained to be a proficient and fancy fighter.
cobblemon.species.kpkoopa.desc2: The KP is just ''Koopa Troopa'' abbreviated, it looks flashier.
cobblemon.species.kpparakoopa.name: KP Parakoopa
cobblemon.species.kpparakoopa.desc1: A winged Koopa who has trained to be a proficient and fancy fighter.
cobblemon.species.kpparakoopa.desc2: The KP is just ''Koopa Troopa'' abbreviated, it looks flashier.
cobblemon.species.hammerbro.name: Hammer Bro
cobblemon.species.hammerbro.desc1: A trained Koopa fighter, who wields throwing hammers
cobblemon.species.firebro.name: Fire Bro
cobblemon.species.firebro.desc1: A trained Koopa fighter, who flings fire
cobblemon.species.boomerangbro.name: Boomerang Bro
cobblemon.species.boomerangbro.desc1: A trained Koopa fighter, who wields a boomerang with surprising skill
cobblemon.species.icebro.name: Ice Bro
cobblemon.species.icebro.desc1: A trained Koopa fighter, who slings snow
cobblemon.species.darkkoopa.name: Dark Koopa
cobblemon.species.darkkoopa.desc1: A Koopa who has grown used to dark environments
cobblemon.species.shadykoopa.name: Shady Koopa
cobblemon.species.shadykoopa.desc1: A Koopa who has dwelled in darkness so long they now play tricks on those who cross their path
cobblemon.species.koopatrol.name: Koopatrol
cobblemon.species.koopatrol.desc1: An elite Koopa warrior who has earned impressive armor.
cobblemon.species.darkkoopatrol.name: Dark Koopatrol
cobblemon.species.darkkoopatrol.desc1: An armored Koopa corrupted and empowered by dark forces,
cobblemon.species.darkkoopatrol.desc2: or perhaps created from them entirely?
cobblemon.species.magikoopa.name: Magikoopa
cobblemon.species.magikoopa.desc1: A magical Koopa who has forgone their shell for robes.
cobblemon.species.kamek.name: Kamek
cobblemon.species.kamek.desc1: A elder magical Koopa who has forgone his shell for robes.
cobblemon.species.kammykoopa.name: Kammy Koopa
cobblemon.species.kammykoopa.desc1: A elder magical Koopa who has forgone her shell for robes.
cobblemon.species.tutankoopa.name: Tutankoopa
cobblemon.species.tutankoopa.desc1: A Koopa wizard who has taken residence in a sandy temple
cobblemon.species.bowser.name: Bowser
cobblemon.species.bowser.desc1: A large and fearsome ruler of Koopa-kind, this turtle-dragon-y monster can spew flames
cobblemon.species.jrtroopa1.name: Jr. Troopa
cobblemon.species.jrtroopa1.desc1: A small yet mighty Koopa, the shell this one wears is an eggshell rather than a turtley one
cobblemon.species.kentckoopa.name: Kent C. Koopa
cobblemon.species.kentckoopa.desc1: A very large Koopa with great defenses and equally-but-inversely awful eyesight
